Technical information:



Ripper : EAC (Secure mode) (except disc 6 that is Burst mode)
CODEC : FLAC (Lvl :8)

All Discs have been image ripped using EAC and Daemon tools image drive to have individual tracks.
 
All images mounted, are the (single file) images from my original rip. (parent LOGs included in the torrent)

Tracks 17 & 18 in Disc 6 are not so accurate because the Disc was a bit scratched as I bought it new.
